https://tmrev.io/movie/987507-Bad City 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/e6Au2fDZtFSdtvml85lgEArcKu8.jpg Kensuke Sonomura directs the legendary Hitoshi Ozawa in this ultimate V-Cinema actioner. Kaiko City is plagued with poverty and crime. When a corrupt businessman decides to run for mayor and starts eliminating opponents from the rival mafia, a former police captain serving time for murder is secretly released and put in charge of a special task force to arrest him. Bad City
